<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sets the default value of Show as field to 'busy' for the existing reservable module records</description>
        <name>Set show as in reservable module</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function setShowAs() {
    var resvModuleGr = new GlideRecord(WSDConstants.TABLES.ReservableModule.name);
    resvModuleGr.addNullQuery('show_as');
    resvModuleGr.query();
    while (resvModuleGr.next()) {
        resvModuleGr.setValue('show_as', 'busy');
        if (!resvModuleGr.update())
            WSDLogger.error("Fix Script: Set show as in reservable module", "Unable to update the default value of the show as field.", resvModuleGr.getLastErrorMessage());
    }
}
setShowAs();]]></script>
